title: Mine Completely
description: No longer available individually, as it is included in "The Billionaire's Obsession ~ Simon (The Billionaire's Obsession, #1)"If you chose to read this book without first reading The Billionaire's Obsession trilogy, you probably won't understand the references to previous events or the characters' personalities. It is recommended that you read Kara and Simon's story before reading this book.
author: J.S. Scott
